data.Sentence_cn: “作为我们专题新闻节目的结尾，”电视广播员说，
data.Sentence: 'To end our special news bulletin,' said the voice of the television announcer,

data.Sentence_cn: “我们现在到克拉布利亚的通心粉田里。”
data.Sentence: 'we're going over to the macaroni fields of Calabria.

data.Sentence_cn: 通心粉在这个地区已经种植了600多年了。
data.Sentence: Macaroni has been grown in this area for over six hundred years.

data.Sentence_cn: 两个主要种植者，朱塞皮.莫尔道瓦和里卡多.布拉班特告诉我，他们一直期待着今年获得一个大丰收，收割工作比往年开始得要早些。
data.Sentence: Two of the leading growers, Giuseppe Moldova and Riccardo Brabante,tell me that they have been expecting a splendid crop this year and harvesting has begun earlier than usual.

data.Sentence_cn: 这里您可以看到两个工人，他们协力割下了3车金黄色的通心粉秸。
data.Sentence: Here you can see two workers who, between them, have just finished cutting three cartloads of golden brown macaroni stalks.

data.Sentence_cn: 全村的人都日夜奋战，要赶在9月的雨季之前把今年的庄稼收获上来，打完场。
data.Sentence: The whole village has been working day and night gathering and threshing this year's crop before the September rains.

data.Sentence_cn: 在屏幕的右侧，您可以看到布拉班特太太本人，她已经帮了她的丈夫30年了。
data.Sentence: On the right, you can see Mrs. Brabante herself. She has been helping her husband for thirty years now.

data.Sentence_cn: 布拉班特太太现在正和负责通心粉加工的当地加工厂的经理交谈。
data.Sentence: Mrs. Brabante is talking to the manager of the local factory where the crop is processed.

data.Sentence_cn: 这最后一个镜头向您展示了收获之后将发生的事情：著名的克拉布利亚人吃通心粉大赛！
data.Sentence: This last scene shows you what will happen at the end of the harvest: the famous Calabrian macaroni-eating competition!

data.Sentence_cn: 目前的冠军弗拉特里先生，自1991年以来，年年获胜。
data.Sentence: Signor Fratelli, the present champion, has won it every year since 1991.

data.Sentence_cn: 今天 -- 4月1日，星期四 -- 的专题新闻节目到此结束。
data.Sentence: And that ends our special bulletin for today, Thursday, April lst.

data.Sentence_cn: 现在我们回到电视演播室。”
data.Sentence: We're now going back to the studio.
